availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John B. Kennaday (Hopkins County, Ky, farmer, caldwell co. petitioner )

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. Hopkins County, Kentucky, native. Son of Champ T. Kennaday and Margaret Edmundson Kennaday. Married to Sarah Mourning Sisk Kennaday in Hopkins County, Kentucky, on August 10, 1854. Father of Margaret Louiza Kennaday and Hester A. Kennaday. Farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 2, p. 169A.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Bucksnort, p. 408B.
"John B. Kennaday (1835-1884)," Find A Grave, Memorial #25117511, accessed December 10, 2021, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/25117511.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994029, Caldwell County Marriages, 1853, p.4.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994039, Hopkins County Births, 1853, p.4.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File #11364.
